name: Government Scheme Prize Scam
description: Scammer impersonates a government initiative (PM Jan Dhan Yojana / Digital India) claiming the victim has been selected for a special bonus, then collects personal details and payment for fake processing fees.

turns.scammer_message: PM Jan Dhan Yojana: Your account has been selected for a special bonus of Rs 1,50,000 under Digital India initiative. This is an automated selection. Verify your details to receive the amount.
turns.notes: Initial bait using legitimate government scheme name to appear official.

turns.scammer_message: Dear beneficiary, to process your PM Jan Dhan Yojana bonus of Rs 1,50,000, a verification charge of Rs 2,000 is required as per government norms. This is a one-time fee for Aadhaar and KYC verification. Please contact our nodal officer at +91-7711223344.
turns.notes: Scammer introduces verification fee and shares fake nodal officer phone number.

turns.scammer_message: For quick processing, please pay Rs 2,000 verification charge via UPI to pmjdy.verify@oksbi (Government Verification Account). Alternatively, you can transfer to account 3322114455667788 (SBI, IFSC: SBIN0005678). Bonus will be credited within 48 hours of verification.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals both UPI ID and bank account for the supposed government verification.

turns.scammer_message: Your PM Jan Dhan bonus verification is pending. As per government circular dated 10-Feb-2026, all unclaimed bonuses will be transferred to PM Relief Fund after the deadline. Pay Rs 2,000 to pmjdy.verify@oksbi or call +91-7711223344 for assistance. Don't let your bonus go unclaimed.
turns.notes: Scammer uses fake government circulars and deadlines to pressure the victim.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL REMINDER from Digital India Office: Your Rs 1,50,000 bonus expires TODAY. Transfer Rs 2,000 to account 3322114455667788 or UPI pmjdy.verify@oksbi immediately. Contact +91-7711223344 for last-minute verification. After today, this amount will be permanently forfeited as per govt rules.
turns.notes: Final urgency combining all fake data points with permanent forfeiture threat.
